thread.title: Take a deep breath because Kylie Cosmetics’ highly anticipated highlighter line is finally here
thread.title_full: Take a deep breath because Kylie Cosmetics’ highly anticipated highlighter line is finally here

author: Amanda Grace
title: Take a deep breath because Kylie Cosmetics’ highly anticipated highlighter line is finally here
text:
Take a deep breath because Kylie Cosmetics’ highly anticipated highlighter line is finally here When word got out last fall that Kylie Cosmetics had trademarked the word “Kylighter,” we knew that it was only a matter of time King Kylie would bless us with glorious highlighters . Today on Snapchat, Kylie showed off several sneak peeks and swatches of the new Kylighters, and they are absolutely bewitching. Just because Valentine’s day is over , doesn’t mean we aren’t still falling in love! With sweet, sugary names and lush pigmentation, these shimmery shades are must-haves for your makeup collection.
The six Kylie Jenner Kylighter Highlighters launch very soon — on February 28th! SHE DOES IT AGAIN! KYLIGHTERS LAUNCHING FEB.28th AT 3pm pst!!! Tune into Kylie's Snapchat right now! 
A post shared by Kylie Cosmetics (@kyliecosmetics) on Feb 22, 2017 at 10:30am PST 
First, Kylie shows us the cute color-coded packaging. Snapchat / Kylie Jenner We can already tell this is a neapolitan of WANT.
Next she shows us the lighter shades, which she says that she loves when she doesn’t have a tan. Snapchat / Kylie Jenner These include French Vanilla, Banana Split, and Cotton Candy Cream. Banana Split is a yellow gold, French Vanilla is a warm rose gold, and Cotton Candy Cream is a cool-toned pink pastel.
Banana Split is truly a royal gold! Snapchat / Kylie Jenner French Vanilla is a perfect pale frost! Snapchat / Kylie Jenner Cotton Candy Cream is Kylie’s fave, and we love the pale pink! Snapchat / Kylie Jenner Kylie’s second fave is Salted Caramel, and we can see why! Snapchat / Kylie Jenner Darker shades like Strawberry Shortcake and Chocolate Cherry are great to double as blush and bronzer!!! Snapchat / Kylie Jenner The bewitching Kylighters will launch February 28th at 3 p.m. PST at Kyliecosmetics.com , so get your wallets ready!
